description: Erection of 2 x roof dormer extensions incorporating a Juliet balcony and 2 x roof lights to facilitate loft conversion and conversion of existing first floor bedroom into bathroom.
decision_conditions: The erection of 2 x roof dormer extensions incorporating a Juliet balcony and 2 x roof lights to facilitate a loft conversion and the conversion of the existing first floor bedroom into a bathroom falls within the parameters of permitted development as set out under Schedule 2, Part 1, Classes B and C of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).

The assessment of this application is based on measurements taken from the submitted drawings / plans. If it transpires that the drawings / plans submitted are incorrect this would nullify the validity of this decision and you are advised to submit a fresh application with the correct information / drawings.
The submitted elevations are labelled as existing and proposed in the same drawings, please submit separate drawings for existing and proposed elevations.
